text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the GIGABYTE AERO 15 Classic-WA-U74ADP 15.6" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 15 Classic-WA-U74ADP 15.6" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The fan noise is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the GIGABYTE AERO 15 Classic-WA-U74ADP 15.6" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The GIGABYTE AERO 15 Classic-WA-U74ADP 15.6" 4K/UHD 60 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for content creation and gaming, but the speakers could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch.
